content: **knitted and felted mittens for men in drops lima ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern li-166 yarn group b ------------------------------------------------------- **sizes** s/m l/xl length of mitten after felting approx 26-27 cm length of mitten before felting approx 34-35 cm length from inside thumb to tip after felting approx 13-13 cm length from inside thumb to tip before felting approx 17-17 cm **yarn** drops lima from garnstudio belongs to yarn group b 100-150 g colour 0519 dark grey **needles** drops double pointed needles size 4 5 mm **knitting gauge** 20 stitches in width and 26 row in height with stocking stitch = 10 x 10 cm note needle size is only a guide if you get too many stitches on 10 cm change to a larger needle size if you get too few stitches on 10 cm change to a smaller needle size
